thread.title: A Group of Curious Felines Warily Check Out a Novelty Pillow That Looks Like a Sleeping Cat
thread.title_full: A Group of Curious Felines Warily Check Out a Novelty Pillow That Looks Like a Sleeping Cat

author: Lori Dorn
title: A Group of Curious Felines Warily Check Out a Novelty Pillow That Looks Like a Sleeping Cat
text:
An adorable group of curious cats thought that they might have had a new addition to their family when their human brought home a very realistic novelty pillow that looked just a sleeping kitty . The inquisitive felines found out that the pillow was a fake when they sniffed at it so hard that it fell into the box upon which it was perched.
A group of cats freaking out over a new cat doll pillow.
